name: Sketch Snap
description: A Sketch plugin that lets you snap layers below, above, left of or right of selected layer to one of its edges.
author: Charlie Chao

commands.name: Snap Layers to Top Edge
commands.description: Move all layers above to the top edge of your selection.

commands.name: Snap Layers to Bottom Edge
commands.description: Move all layers below to the bottom edge of your selection.

commands.name: Snap Layers to Left Edge
commands.description: Move all layers on left to the left edge of your selection.

commands.name: Snap Layers to Right Edge
commands.description: Move all layers on right to the right edge of your selection.

commands.name: Select Layers Above
commands.description: Select all layers above your selection.

commands.name: Select Layers Below
commands.description: Select all layers below your selection.

commands.name: Select Layers On Left
commands.description: Select all layers on the left of your selection.

commands.name: Select Layers On Right
commands.description: Select all layers on the right of your selection.
